user_incident_text: My husband forces me to have sexual intercourse with him even when I am sick or don't want to. He says it is his right as a husband. When I refuse, he gets very aggressive and verbally abuses me.
ipc_description: Section 375 of the IPC defines rape. While historically marital rape was not considered a crime in India, a recent legal exception applies if the wife is below 18 years of age. However, forced sexual acts by a husband on his wife can be considered a form of sexual abuse under PWDVA, and in some contexts, a criminal offense.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA's definition of domestic violence includes sexual abuse, which covers any conduct of a sexual nature that abuses, humiliates, or endangers the well-being of the aggrieved person.
keywords: forced sexual intercourse, aggressive, verbally abuses

user_incident_text: My in-laws constantly demand money and gifts from my parents. When I fail to bring anything, they insult me in front of everyone.
ipc_description: Section 498A criminalizes cruelty by husband or relatives, including harassment related to unlawful demands for dowry.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA includes harassment by coercing a woman or her relatives to meet unlawful demands for dowry.

user_incident_text: My husband slapped me multiple times last night because I questioned his drinking habits.
ipc_description: Section 323 punishes voluntarily causing hurt with imprisonment up to 1 year, or fine, or both.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes physical abuse as any act causing bodily pain, harm, or endangerment to health.

user_incident_text: My husband locked me inside the bedroom for hours and refused to give me food because I disagreed with him.
ipc_description: Section 340 defines wrongful confinement as unlawfully restraining a person from proceeding beyond certain limits.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA includes physical restriction of movements and denial of basic needs as forms of abuse.
keywords: locked in room, denial of food, wrongful confinement

user_incident_text: My brother-in-law makes obscene comments about my body and touches me inappropriately whenever he gets a chance.
ipc_section: Section 354 (Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty)
ipc_description: Section 354 deals with assault or use of criminal force against a woman intending to outrage her modesty.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes unwelcome physical contact or sexual conduct as sexual abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband threw a glass at me in anger which injured my forehead badly.
ipc_section: Section 324 (Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means)
ipc_description: Section 324 covers causing hurt using dangerous weapons or means, punishable with imprisonment up to 3 years.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Causing physical injury with objects or weapons is a recognized form of abuse under PWDVA.
keywords: glass injury, forehead wound, dangerous act

user_incident_text: My husband repeatedly threatens to kill me if I ever think of leaving him.
ipc_description: Section 506 punishes criminal intimidation, including threats of injury to person, reputation, or property.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA includes constant threats or intimidation as a form of emotional abuse.

user_incident_text: My in-laws constantly criticize my cooking and call me worthless in front of neighbors.
ipc_section: Section 509 (Word, gesture or act intended to insult the modesty of a woman)
ipc_description: Section 509 punishes insulting words, gestures, or acts intended to insult a woman's modesty.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA covers repeated verbal insults and humiliation in private or public.

user_incident_text: My husband refuses to give me money for groceries or my personal needs, forcing me to beg from my parents.
ipc_description: Section 406 punishes misuse of entrusted property, which can extend to economic exploitation.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA defines economic abuse as denial of financial resources or necessities.

user_incident_text: My husband and his relatives keep reminding me that my parents gave less dowry and that I am a burden on them.
ipc_section: Section 304B (Dowry death, if harassment leads to death within 7 years of marriage)
ipc_description: Section 304B punishes dowry deaths, but harassment over dowry also falls under Section 498A.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes dowry-related insults and coercion as domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband beats me with a belt whenever he is angry, leaving marks on my body.
ipc_description: Section 325 punishes causing grievous hurt with imprisonment up to 7 years and fine.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Inflicting bodily pain or harm is considered physical abuse under PWDVA.
keywords: belt beating, grievous hurt, injury marks

user_incident_text: My husband forces me to watch pornography against my will and threatens me if I resist.
ipc_description: Section 354A includes sexually colored remarks, showing pornography, and physical contact against a woman’s will.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes forced exposure to sexual content as abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband often threatens to burn me alive if I don’t bring more money from my parents.
ipc_description: Section 307 punishes attempts to commit murder, including threats involving fire or poison.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Threats to life linked with financial demands fall under PWDVA.
keywords: burn threat, dowry, attempt to murder

user_incident_text: My father-in-law touched me inappropriately while no one was around and told me not to tell anyone.
ipc_description: Section 354 criminalizes assault or use of force with intent to outrage a woman's modesty.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA includes inappropriate sexual advances by in-laws as abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband frequently restricts me from leaving the house, meeting friends, or talking to my family.
ipc_description: Section 341 punishes wrongful restraint of a person from proceeding in any direction they have a right to go.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA considers restriction of movement and isolation as emotional abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband kicked me in the stomach during an argument, causing severe pain.
ipc_description: Section 323 covers physical assault resulting in bodily pain or injury.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Any act causing pain or bodily harm is physical abuse under PWDVA.

user_incident_text: My husband constantly abuses me with filthy language and calls me characterless.
ipc_description: Section 509 punishes words or gestures intended to insult the modesty of a woman.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Verbal humiliation and degrading remarks are covered under PWDVA.

user_incident_text: My husband poured hot tea on my hand deliberately during an argument.
ipc_section: Section 324 (Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous means)
ipc_description: Section 324 punishes causing hurt with dangerous objects or means, including hot liquids.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Using hot substances to harm someone is recognized as physical abuse under PWDVA.
keywords: hot tea burn, deliberate injury, argument

user_incident_text: My husband refuses to pay for my medical treatment even when I am seriously ill.
ipc_description: Section 406 punishes withholding resources entrusted for well-being, including medical expenses.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Denying medical expenses is recognized as economic abuse under PWDVA.
keywords: medical neglect, economic abuse, denial of treatment

user_incident_text: My husband locked me in the bathroom for hours as punishment when I refused his orders.
ipc_description: Section 342 punishes wrongful confinement, imprisoning someone without authority.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA treats forced confinement in any part of the house as domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My mother-in-law constantly threatens to throw me out of the house if I don't obey her.
ipc_description: Section 503 defines criminal intimidation as threatening to cause injury or harm.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA covers threats of eviction or abandonment as emotional abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband broke my mobile phone when I tried to call my parents for help.
ipc_description: Section 427 punishes causing damage to property intentionally.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes deliberate destruction of property as abuse.
keywords: mobile phone broken, property damage, isolation

user_incident_text: My husband often strangles me with his hands during fights, leaving me terrified.
ipc_description: Section 307 punishes attempts to commit murder, including strangulation.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Strangulation attempts are life-threatening and recognized as domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband’s friends pass vulgar comments about me and he laughs instead of stopping them.
ipc_description: Section 509 punishes words or gestures intended to insult modesty of a woman.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: PWDVA includes tolerating or encouraging humiliating remarks by others.

user_incident_text: My husband slapped me in front of my children, humiliating me and causing pain.
ipc_description: Section 323 punishes voluntarily causing hurt with imprisonment and/or fine.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Physical assault and humiliation in front of children is domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband prevents me from working and earning money even though I am qualified.
ipc_description: Section 498A includes harassment and restrictions that cause mental cruelty.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Preventing employment is considered economic abuse under PWDVA.

user_incident_text: My husband locks away all household money and gives me nothing to spend on food.
ipc_description: Section 406 applies when entrusted property or funds are dishonestly misused.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Denying money for daily household needs is economic abuse under PWDVA.
keywords: money control, food deprivation, economic neglect

user_incident_text: My husband forces me to drink alcohol with him even though I do not want to.

ipc_description: Section 328 criminalizes causing a person to consume intoxicants against their will.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Forcing harmful substances is a form of physical and emotional abuse.

user_incident_text: My husband regularly threatens to kill my parents if I disclose the abuse.

pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Threatening harm to relatives is emotional abuse under PWDVA.

user_incident_text: My husband often beats me with household objects like sticks and utensils.

ipc_description: Section 324 punishes use of objects to cause hurt.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Harming with household objects is recognized as domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband forces me to sleep outside the house as punishment after arguments.

pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Making someone sleep outside as punishment is domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband’s brother stalks me around the house and makes lewd gestures.

user_incident_text: My husband forces me to beg for money from my parents for his gambling habits.

pwdva_description: PWDVA recognizes forced financial exploitation as domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband throws utensils and objects at me during arguments.

pwdva_description: Throwing objects in anger is considered physical abuse under PWDVA.

user_incident_text: My husband humiliates me in front of guests by insulting my cooking and appearance.

user_incident_text: My husband locks me inside the bedroom for hours whenever he is angry. He does not allow me to go out, even to meet family or friends.
ipc_description: Section 340 defines wrongful confinement as unlawfully restraining a person in such a manner as to prevent them from proceeding beyond certain circumscribed limits.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005

user_incident_text: My brother follows me everywhere I go. He waits outside my workplace and constantly calls me to know where I am.

user_incident_text: My father-in-law broke my phone deliberately so that I cannot call my parents or the police for help.

user_incident_text: My husband threatens to burn my clothes and personal belongings whenever we fight.

user_incident_text: My cousin locked me inside the house and took away the keys so that I couldn’t attend my classes.

pwdva_description: Stalking and threatening to intimidate constitutes domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My in-laws smashed my TV, fan, and fridge after a family argument.
ipc_description: Deliberate destruction of property belonging to another is punishable.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Destroying belongings to intimidate or control someone is domestic violence.
keywords: TV smashed, fan destroyed, fridge broken, in-laws, property destruction

user_incident_text: My husband hit me with a heavy stick multiple times in anger.
ipc_description: Using force or a weapon to cause hurt is punishable under IPC.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Physical assault with an object constitutes domestic violence.
keywords: hit with stick, husband, physical abuse, weapon assault

user_incident_text: My father repeatedly threatened to harm me if I disobeyed him, holding a sharp rod.
ipc_description: Threatening with a weapon or attempting to cause hurt is punishable.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Threatening harm with a rod constitutes domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My spouse locked me in the bathroom for hours to punish me.
ipc_description: Wrongful confinement is punishable under IPC.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Locking someone to control or punish them constitutes domestic violence.
keywords: locked in bathroom, spouse, confinement, emotional abuse

user_incident_text: My sibling threatened to damage my personal belongings if I didn’t give him money.
ipc_description: Threatening to destroy property is punishable under IPC.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Threatening property to intimidate constitutes domestic violence.

user_incident_text: My husband pointed a gun at me during an argument and threatened to kill me.
ipc_description: Attempt to commit murder and threatening someone is punishable.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Pointing a firearm to intimidate or harm constitutes domestic violence.
keywords: gun threat, husband, weapon assault, threat

user_incident_text: My brother cornered me with a kitchen knife and threatened to hurt me if I told anyone.
ipc_description: Using a weapon to cause hurt or threatening someone is punishable under IPC.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Threatening with a knife constitutes domestic violence.
keywords: knife threat, brother, weapon assault, threat

user_incident_text: My spouse locked me in the bedroom overnight and took away my phone.
ipc_description: Wrongful confinement of a person is punishable.
pwdva_title: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
pwdva_description: Locking someone and taking away communication means constitutes domestic violence.
keywords: locked in bedroom, spouse, no phone, confinement

user_incident_text: My in-laws destroyed my laptop and important documents after a dispute.

pwdva_description: Destroying belongings to intimidate or control someone is domestic violence.
